featured.text: A triumph for medical technology, Oddsson’s fish skin transplantation was actually part of the astonishing achievement of “100% Fish,” an ambitious task in promoting environmental efficiency.
But 29 , Rwanda is a symbol of the triumph of the human spirit over evil.
These people usually triumph over their enemies because of their wit and their great energy.

definition.zh_def: 勝利；成功的喜悅或成就
definition.example: Her team celebrated their triumph after winning the championship.
